recipe_name: Roast figs with honey and yoghurt
author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Cut into the figs to make a cross on the top. Place on a baking sheet and drizzle with the honey. Place into the preheated oven and cook for five minutes.  To serve place the figs on a plate with the Greek yogurt and garnish with the orange segments.
ingredients: 2 figs ,  2 tbsp honey,  1 pinch cinnamon,  50g/1Â¾oz Greek yoghurt,  1 orange, segmented
